content: in less than five hours you can whip up a chunky throw that s equal parts whimsy and luxury worked with chunky yarn in simple stitches this is a big crochet project that works up faster than most scarves using very basic chain and double_crochet stitches you ll breeze through the body of the afghan in about three and a half hours and then add some pizazz with squishy tassels this pattern is appropriate for confident beginners and anyone who likes to finish an entire afghan in a day downloading -this listing is for the presto 4 5 hour afghan crochet pattern pdf only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment copyright/making finished items - thank you for sharing my patterns and tutorials when you do it helps support the blog and my ability to create more patterns which by the way i seriously love to do so really i mean it thank you you may make items to sell with this pattern/tutorial in exchange i ask that you link back to makeanddocrew com do not use my photos as your own sales photos do not distribute my patterns/templates as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind return policy - as this is a digital product i do not offer returns you can find all my free modern crochet patterns and tutorials here 1 1 https //makeanddocrew com/category/knitting-and-crocheting/
